For this challenge we are only expected to patch the function to always accept a password. I encountered some issues with this program and I was not able to execute it, my solution should be correct but may require some minor tweaks.

Open ghidra and load up the executable. Search for strings and find the â€œPlease enter the password:â€ entry. Find the function in which the string gets used and we can start patching. A few lines after the message gets used we can find a comparison and a jump.

` MOVZX EAL, AL TEST EAX, EAX JZ LABâ€¦ `

If the value in EAX is \0, the JZ (jump if zero) instruction executes, leading to the â€œAccess Deniedâ€ message. We donâ€™t want that to happen, so weâ€™ll modify this jump. To always reach the â€œAccess Grantedâ€ message we can change the â€œJZ LABâ€ instruction into a â€œNOPâ€ instruction, this means that NO Operation will be performed and thus the program will step into the conditional block that we want it to. At the end of the code block the code will jump into the cleanup area of the code, so we donâ€™t have to worry about any other operations reverting our progress.
